====Derived terms====

====Usage notes====
* Originally, it was a neutral everyday term, but starting from the mid [[1990s]], the term has gained negative connotations in Hong Kong. The stereotypical {{lang|zh|師奶}} is a middle-aged married woman who is ignorant and easily tempted by petty gains.
